transcript.text: Shalom this is irrefutable proof that
the earth is only six thousand years old
why is this important this is important
well it the litter dates the Bible of
course but it's also important for a lot
of Christians to understand - because
Yahshua has a plan
he has six days that you work and the
seventh day the Shabbat you rest this is
a plan he's outlined for us to follow
every single week you work Sunday
through Friday and then from Friday
sunset to Saturday sunset you rest you
recuperate it's the Shabbat the Sabbath
day and in the same way the Earth's age
reflects that there's 6,000 years that
man has toiled with sin and labor on
this earth and we're very soon to enter
the Sabbath millennium the 1000 year
reign in which Yahshua will rule and
reign as king and here a scientific
proof that the earth is only 6,000 years
of age I like to make these videos short
and to the point because I don't want to
get lost in all the details so we're
going to talk about the moon and we're
going to talk about the recession of the
moon there's a gravitational pull that
the moon creates it's called a tidal
bulge and it creates this tidal bulge on
earth and it causes the moon to spiral
outwards very slowly so every year that
the moon is orbiting the earth it is
getting incremental e farther and
farther from the earth so if you use
sort of deduction from that the moon
would have been closer to the earth the
farther you go back in the past based on
gravitational forces and the current
rate of recession we can calculate how
much the moon has moved away over time
now if the earth is only six thousand
years old
there's no problem because in that time
the moon would have only moved about 800
feet or 250 meters but most astronomy
books teach that the moon is over four
billion years old which poses a major
major problem because less than 1.5
billion years ago the
une would have been touching the earth
so this one evidence this one proof and
by the way this is observable empirical
data this is observable science this
isn't just some theory or some you know
something that someone in an ivory tower
sort of imagines in their mind this is
concrete evidence you can actually
measure how far the moon is receding
from the earth every year and it even
causes the tidal waves on earth so this
isn't just some made-up thing the earth
and the moon cannot be billions of years
old there's no way this is a very clear
evidence scientifically that the earth
is only six thousand years old
just as the Bible declares through its
chronology in the book of Genesis my
name is Daniel John Lee and the website
is www.antakungfu.com
